paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio naturally includes a powerful Eiffel compiler, which is at the core of the IDE. It supports the entire Eiffel language as defined in the third edition of Eiffel: The Language.

This compiler uses the
50_technology/05_melting_ice_technology.xml melting ice technology (TM) , which accounts for lightning-fast incremental recompilations, ideal during the development cycle. It also provides finalization, which yields a high level of optimization that should be used for released programs.

This reference describes some advanced functionality of the Eiffel Software compiler, such as
30_external_features/index.xml making external calls from Eiffel .

You can find more advanced technologies relative to the Eiffel Software compiler and environment in the
/technologies/index.xml technologies part of the documentation.
